lines: 0x52x0 crazily drunk 0m49m0 gets 0x47x0 0x48x0 of the pubs 0x49x0 0x50x0 0x51x0  0x52x0 0x53x0 0x54x0 0x55x0 comes out
You best not be coming back here  I dont care how famous you are
I want them armed and ready to march  within two weeks
But my lord there are too many They  cannot all be armed in time we dont  have the means
Build a dam block the stream work  the furnaces night and day
We dont have enough fuel to feed the  fires
